extendedInfo.description: MixZing is simply the most advanced media player around!â· Internet Radio brings you thousands of great stations to listen to: browse by genre or let us recommend ones that match your tasteâ· Music ID identifies your songs, even those without valid tags, and lets you clean up their tags and album artâ· Displays lyrics for millions of songsâ· Mood Player creates custom listening sessions--like Pandora for your music!â· Graphic equalizer for MP3, AAC/M4A and OGG filesâ· Automatically saves playlists and lets you restore deleted onesâ· Folder browser lets you access your media collection by storage foldersâ· Tag editor for most file typesâ· Discover new music with spot-on recommendationsâ· Lock-screen widget to control player while phone is lockedâ· Sleep timerâ· Automatically downloads missing album artâ· Home-screen widgets with album artâ· Batch playlist editingâ· Genre and video browsing

reviews.title: Best player on the market.
reviews.comment: I\'ve tried most media players on play and this is the only one I stayed with.  With the new update media from across the web is available easily at your fingertips.  This app even has widget players for your home screen.  Best of all, it has a folder view that doesn\'t just cram all my music together via tags.  My only complaints... the widget control buttons disappear and when I shuffle all the player shuffles in the same order every time.  UPDATE... shuffle still shuffles songs in the same order
reviews.author: Jeff R

reviews.title: great. improvise more
reviews.comment: great apps. nice new layouts. but it would be nicer added new equilizer. i give 5 stars. anyway goodjob since i used mixing before this new version. keep up the good work
reviews.author: Ahmad Rashdan

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: But i wish they\'d add more sound feats like power amp to optimize audio quality but overall its good, better than nothing
reviews.author: estebebe28 .

reviews.title: Everything I want
reviews.comment: I tried the free version of this player and decided immediately the ads were too much. However, the player has everything I want plus more. Good price for that many features and the ability to edit meta data for songs.
reviews.author: afwallace21

reviews.title: It\'s aye
reviews.comment: It\'s o.k it need little work  fix the bugs because  sometime it freeze up but after all this is a free app its not perfect it\'s close enough
reviews.author: Traci Good

reviews.title: Still why?
reviews.comment: Why not have all of your songs  play by default instead of having to hit the hidden \"play all from here\" button? That\'s how every other music player works. There should at least be an option to enable this in the settings.   Regardless, still my favorite music player for android.
reviews.author: Austin Hughes

reviews.title: Xperia ZL
reviews.comment: Worst app ever. Froze, wouldn\'t force stop and then deleted everything on my micro sd card including photo\'s and video\'s
reviews.author: Sina Ronaghi

reviews.title: Geez another retarded media player
reviews.comment: Crap. Seriously goofy user interface.  Lists display a count in front of the song..  No selecting a single media folder or specific folders.  Waste of space in lists showing too much information.  The equalizer is horrible.
reviews.author: Vincent Terpe

reviews.title: Pros nd cons
reviews.comment: Lv dis app..  Pros- UI looks amz Easy to use FMs hv absolutely no buffering time(for me atleast) Lets me download d arts of songs Free!! Cons- nothing except a few add popups (not too bothering) (hardly noticible at times)(dis is y its free)
reviews.author: Ishaan Shakunt

reviews.title: Auto start up problem
reviews.comment: I\'m having problem with its auto start up. This happens randomly n music starts playing from my pocket all the sudden. Pls fix this bug. Im using android 4.3 btw. Tq.
reviews.author: Aaron Tan

reviews.title: Skipping isn\'t an option
reviews.comment: Literally, I cannot skip to the next song. Its blanked out and won\'t give me the option to skip to another song. Not sire why that is. Any ideas gentlemen?
reviews.author: antoinette malcolm

reviews.title: Cover art doesnot show up
reviews.comment: I cant see some album covers,also it takes forever to open
reviews.author: Anano Kakabadze

reviews.title: Request
reviews.comment: MixZing is an amazing music player. How ever I find something that could be useful. Either don\'t know how to do it but if you can, add a process of allowing to select on multiple artists or songs to add to a playlist. Instead of selecting one album at a time or one artist or one genre at a time being able to select more than one of those and adding them to playlists would be a reliever for organizing music.
reviews.author: David Bellus

reviews.title: Video ads suck
reviews.comment: Music clips constantly and the random video ads that play when you open the app or play a song is really annoying. Banner ads aren\'t good enough? Seriously?
reviews.author: Robert Wilson

reviews.title: Amazing!!
reviews.comment: Excellent work..  I have tried 10-15 music players but this one is the best and that too by a big margin..  Amazing song recommendations and equaliser is so perfect that you don\'t need to tweak even a bit..
reviews.author: Arnav Sharma

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: I have had this app since my first droid, absolute best music app ever, thanks
reviews.author: kimberly Wallace

reviews.title: Random
reviews.comment: Is not random. Add some new songs to an existing playlist and \"random\" will only play new songs.  Latest update: volume rocker does not work while the screen is on... Widget has been very unresponsive for a few updates now.
reviews.author: Stephen Schram

reviews.title: Great app!
reviews.comment: Would be 5 star if i had the option to edit genre list.
reviews.author: jeffrey Sasaki

reviews.title: Best music player for android, hands down
reviews.comment: I just wish I knew where the mood player option was and how you use it. Can\'t find any info on the subject. Still not enough reason to give this any less than 5 stars though.
reviews.author: Ser Bab

reviews.title: stop push ads
reviews.comment: I want to hear music not see push ads that slow my phone down and cause me to not hear music.
reviews.author: Eric Gustafsson
